Lancer Skincare Instant Brightening Booster

Brand: Lancer

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Dimethicone, Ascorbic Acid, Polysilicone-11, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Menthyl Ethylamido Oxalate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Rhizome Extract, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf

Longa (Turmeric) Rhizome Extract, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Limonene
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
